Al-Fatihah.content: Bismillahir-Rahmanir-Rahim. Alhamdu lillahi Rabbil 'alamin. Ar-Rahmanir-Rahim. Maliki yawmid-Din. Iyyaka na'budu wa iyyaka nasta'in. Ihdinas-siratal-mustaqim. Siratal-ladhina an'amta 'alayhim, ghayril-maghbubi 'alayhim wa lad-Dallin.

Al-Ikhlas.content: Qul huwallahu ahad. Allahus-Samad. Lam yalid wa lam yoolad. Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad.

Al-Falaq.content: Qul a'udhu birabbil-falaq. Min sharri ma khalaq. Wa min sharri ghasiq idha waqab. Wa min sharri nafathati fil 'uqad. Wa min sharri hasidin idha hasad.

An-Nas.content: Qul a'udhu birabbin-nas. Malikin-nas. Ilahin-nas. Min sharri al-waswasil-khannas. Alladhi yuwaswisu fi sudurin-nas. Min al-jinnati wannas.

Al-Nasr.content: Iza jaa nasrullahi wal-fath. Wa ra'aytan-nasa yadkhuluna fi dinillahi afwaja. Fa-sabbih bi-hamdi rabbika wastaghfirhu. Innahu kanat-tawwaba.
